 2011-06212011-06-16,  ,  CIC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS to reflect the language currently in use in the French or English texts more accurately and to ensure consistency in the English and/or French terminology throughout the Regulations. The amendments address comments made by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0126 Publication Date: 2011-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
